name: Ultimate God Angel Gigaforce EX
description:
In this hectic narrative-driven VR space battle, you and your squadron must protect the uncanny space goddess Ultimatra from bizarre evolving space insects from another dimension! Steal crystal energy power from the bugs before extra dimensional radiation overwhelms you! Rock out to original dynamic music while space itself dances to the beat!

Pilot your Gigaforce EX ship into another world using virtual cockpit controls. 

This game was built over a week for VR Jam 2020!

Taylor Shechet - 3D Art, Animation, Visual Design

https://twitter.com/_tlr_

Jeremy W. Kaufmann - Music, Audio/SFX, Writing, VFX

https://twitter.com/whydoisay

Jason Gluck - Rigging/Procedural Animation, Gameplay Programming, UI/UX

https://twitter.com/jasonofthestorm

Voice actors:  Angela Legg, Keiko Takamura, Taylor Shechet, Jeremy W. Kaufmann, Jason Gluck, Dr. Sbaitso

Only designed for Oculus Rift at the moment, but we will be adding additional headsets in the future. May work on other headsets as is, but has not been tested yet.
